channel.title: 474 luminosity; Trouble with Hosting
channel.description:
Ive tried a year or so ago with the hosting on my computer, and it never seems to work. ive went through so many different steps, and processes and it never works.
I did notice, through all my failure and getting the server up online. Was.. i couldnt find in the server source files, not the client source files, where i can actually add the server ip, i can find the port.. but i dont know where to put my ip that id like to use.
in a 317 its obviously in the server/client notepad in the server source folders, but im new to more updated editions of runescape. so im very clueless on where to look! i need help please help me!
really wanna get this server running!
